37 #include <moveit/trajectory_processing/iterative_spline_parameterization.h>
38 #include <moveit/robot_state/conversions.h>
39 #include <vector>
40 
41 static const double VLIMIT = 1.0; // default if not specified in model
42 static const double ALIMIT = 1.0; // default if not specified in model
43 
44 namespace trajectory_processing
45 {
46 static void fit_cubic_spline(const int n, const double dt[], const double x[], double x1[], double x2[]);
47 static void adjust_two_positions(const int n, const double dt[], double x[], double x1[], double x2[],
48  const double x2_i, const double x2_f);
49 static void init_times(const int n, double dt[], const double x[], const double max_velocity, const double min_velocity);
50 static int fit_spline_and_adjust_times(const int n, double dt[], const double x[], double x1[], double x2[],
51  const double max_velocity, const double min_velocity,
52  const double max_acceleration, const double min_acceleration,
53  const double tfactor);
54 static double global_adjustment_factor(const int n, double dt[], const double x[], double x1[], double x2[],
55  const double max_velocity, const double min_velocity,
56  const double max_acceleration, const double min_acceleration);
57 
58 // The path of a single joint: positions, velocities, and accelerations
59 struct SingleJointTrajectory
60 {
61  std::vector<double> positions_; // joint's position at time[x]
62  std::vector<double> velocities_;
63  std::vector<double> accelerations_;
64  double initial_acceleration_;
65  double final_acceleration_;
66  double min_velocity_;
67  double max_velocity_;
68  double min_acceleration_;
69  double max_acceleration_;
70 };
71 
72 void globalAdjustment(std::vector<SingleJointTrajectory>& t2, int num_joints, const int num_points,
73  std::vector<double>& time_diff);
74 
75 IterativeSplineParameterization::IterativeSplineParameterization(bool add_points) : add_points_(add_points)
76 {
77 }
78 
79 bool IterativeSplineParameterization::computeTimeStamps(robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory& trajectory,
80  const double max_velocity_scaling_factor,
81  const double max_acceleration_scaling_factor) const
82 {
83  if (trajectory.empty())
84  return true;
85 
86  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* group = trajectory.getGroup();
87  if (!group)
88  {
89  ROS_ERROR_NAMED("trajectory_processing.iterative_spline_parameterization", "It looks like the planner did not set "
90  "the group the plan was computed for");
91  return false;
92  }
93  const moveit::core::RobotModel& rmodel = group->getParentModel();
94  const std::vector<int>& idx = group->getVariableIndexList();
95  const std::vector<std::string>& vars = group->getVariableNames();
96  double velocity_scaling_factor = 1.0;
97  double acceleration_scaling_factor = 1.0;
98  unsigned int num_points = trajectory.getWayPointCount();
99  unsigned int num_joints = group->getVariableCount();
100 
101  // Set scaling factors
102  if (max_velocity_scaling_factor > 0.0 && max_velocity_scaling_factor <= 1.0)
103  velocity_scaling_factor = max_velocity_scaling_factor;
104  else if (max_velocity_scaling_factor == 0.0)
105  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("trajectory_processing.iterative_spline_parameterization",
106  "A max_velocity_scaling_factor of 0.0 was specified, defaulting to %f instead.",
107  velocity_scaling_factor);
108  else
109  ROS_WARN_NAMED("trajectory_processing.iterative_spline_parameterization",
110  "Invalid max_velocity_scaling_factor %f specified, defaulting to %f instead.",
111  max_velocity_scaling_factor, velocity_scaling_factor);
112 
113  if (max_acceleration_scaling_factor > 0.0 && max_acceleration_scaling_factor <= 1.0)
114  acceleration_scaling_factor = max_acceleration_scaling_factor;
115  else if (max_acceleration_scaling_factor == 0.0)
116  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("trajectory_processing.iterative_spline_parameterization",
117  "A max_acceleration_scaling_factor of 0.0 was specified, defaulting to %f instead.",
118  acceleration_scaling_factor);
119  else
120  ROS_WARN_NAMED("trajectory_processing.iterative_spline_parameterization",
121  "Invalid max_acceleration_scaling_factor %f specified, defaulting to %f instead.",
122  max_acceleration_scaling_factor, acceleration_scaling_factor);
123 
124  // No wrapped angles.
125  trajectory.unwind();
126 
127  if (add_points_)
128  {
129  // Insert 2nd and 2nd-last points
130  // (required to force acceleration to specified values at endpoints)
131  if (trajectory.getWayPointCount() >= 2)
132  {
133  moveit::core::RobotState point = trajectory.getWayPoint(1);
134  moveit::core::RobotStatePtr p0, p1;
135 
136  // 2nd point is 90% of p0, and 10% of p1
137  p0 = trajectory.getWayPointPtr(0);
138  p1 = trajectory.getWayPointPtr(1);
139  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < num_joints; j++)
140  {
141  point.setVariablePosition(idx[j],
142  (9 * p0->getVariablePosition(idx[j]) + 1 * p1->getVariablePosition(idx[j])) / 10);
143  }
144  trajectory.insertWayPoint(1, point, 0.0);
145  num_points++;
146 
147  // 2nd-last point is 10% of p0, and 90% of p1
148  p0 = trajectory.getWayPointPtr(num_points - 2);
149  p1 = trajectory.getWayPointPtr(num_points - 1);
150  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < num_joints; j++)
151  {
152  point.setVariablePosition(idx[j],
153  (1 * p0->getVariablePosition(idx[j]) + 9 * p1->getVariablePosition(idx[j])) / 10);
154  }
155  trajectory.insertWayPoint(num_points - 1, point, 0.0);
156  num_points++;
157  }
158  }
159 
160  // JointTrajectory indexes in [point][joint] order.
161  // We need [joint][point] order to solve efficiently,
162  // so convert form here.
163 
164  std::vector<SingleJointTrajectory> t2(num_joints);
165 
166  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < num_joints; j++)
167  {
168  // Copy positions
169  t2[j].positions_.resize(num_points, 0.0);
170  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < num_points; i++)
171  {
172  t2[j].positions_[i] = trajectory.getWayPointPtr(i)->getVariablePosition(idx[j]);
173  }
174 
175  // Initialize velocities
176  t2[j].velocities_.resize(num_points, 0.0);
177  // Copy initial/final velocities if specified
178  if (trajectory.getWayPointPtr(0)->hasVelocities())
179  t2[j].velocities_[0] = trajectory.getWayPointPtr(0)->getVariableVelocity(idx[j]);
180  if (trajectory.getWayPointPtr(num_points - 1)->hasVelocities())
181  t2[j].velocities_[num_points - 1] = trajectory.getWayPointPtr(num_points - 1)->getVariableVelocity(idx[j]);
182 
183  // Initialize accelerations
184  t2[j].accelerations_.resize(num_points, 0.0);
185  t2[j].initial_acceleration_ = 0.0;
186  t2[j].final_acceleration_ = 0.0;
187  // Copy initial/final accelerations if specified
188  if (trajectory.getWayPointPtr(0)->hasAccelerations())
189  t2[j].initial_acceleration_ = trajectory.getWayPointPtr(0)->getVariableAcceleration(idx[j]);
190  t2[j].accelerations_[0] = t2[j].initial_acceleration_;
191  if (trajectory.getWayPointPtr(num_points - 1)->hasAccelerations())
192  t2[j].final_acceleration_ = trajectory.getWayPointPtr(num_points - 1)->getVariableAcceleration(idx[j]);
193  t2[j].accelerations_[num_points - 1] = t2[j].final_acceleration_;
194 
195  // Set bounds based on model, or default limits
196  const moveit::core::VariableBounds& bounds = rmodel.getVariableBounds(vars[j]);
197  t2[j].max_velocity_ = VLIMIT;
198  t2[j].min_velocity_ = -VLIMIT;
199  if (bounds.velocity_bounded_)
200  {
201  t2[j].max_velocity_ = bounds.max_velocity_;
202  t2[j].min_velocity_ = bounds.min_velocity_;
203  if (t2[j].min_velocity_ == 0.0)
204  t2[j].min_velocity_ = -t2[j].max_velocity_;
205  }
206  t2[j].max_velocity_ *= velocity_scaling_factor;
207  t2[j].min_velocity_ *= velocity_scaling_factor;
208 
209  t2[j].max_acceleration_ = ALIMIT;
210  t2[j].min_acceleration_ = -ALIMIT;
211  if (bounds.acceleration_bounded_)
212  {
213  t2[j].max_acceleration_ = bounds.max_acceleration_;
214  t2[j].min_acceleration_ = bounds.min_acceleration_;
215  if (t2[j].min_acceleration_ == 0.0)
216  t2[j].min_acceleration_ = -t2[j].max_acceleration_;
217  }
218  t2[j].max_acceleration_ *= acceleration_scaling_factor;
219  t2[j].min_acceleration_ *= acceleration_scaling_factor;
220 
221  // Error out if bounds don't make sense
222  if (t2[j].max_velocity_ <= 0.0 || t2[j].max_acceleration_ <= 0.0)
223  {
224  ROS_ERROR_NAMED("trajectory_processing.iterative_spline_parameterization",
225  "Joint %d max velocity %f and max acceleration %f must be greater than zero "
226  "or a solution won't be found.\n",
227  j, t2[j].max_velocity_, t2[j].max_acceleration_);
228  return false;
229  }
230  if (t2[j].min_velocity_ >= 0.0 || t2[j].min_acceleration_ >= 0.0)
231  {
232  ROS_ERROR_NAMED("trajectory_processing.iterative_spline_parameterization",
233  "Joint %d min velocity %f and min acceleration %f must be less than zero "
234  "or a solution won't be found.\n",
235  j, t2[j].min_velocity_, t2[j].min_acceleration_);
236  return false;
237  }
238  }
239 
240  // Error check
241  if (num_points < 4)
242  {
243  ROS_ERROR_NAMED("trajectory_processing.iterative_spline_parameterization",
244  "number of waypoints %d, needs to be greater than 3.\n", num_points);
245  return false;
246  }
247  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < num_joints; j++)
248  {
249  if (t2[j].velocities_[0] > t2[j].max_velocity_ || t2[j].velocities_[0] < t2[j].min_velocity_)
250  {
251  ROS_ERROR_NAMED("trajectory_processing.iterative_spline_parameterization", "Initial velocity %f out of bounds\n",
252  t2[j].velocities_[0]);
253  return false;
254  }
255  else if (t2[j].velocities_[num_points - 1] > t2[j].max_velocity_ ||
256  t2[j].velocities_[num_points - 1] < t2[j].min_velocity_)
257  {
258  ROS_ERROR_NAMED("trajectory_processing.iterative_spline_parameterization", "Final velocity %f out of bounds\n",
259  t2[j].velocities_[num_points - 1]);
260  return false;
261  }
262  else if (t2[j].accelerations_[0] > t2[j].max_acceleration_ || t2[j].accelerations_[0] < t2[j].min_acceleration_)
263  {
264  ROS_ERROR_NAMED("trajectory_processing.iterative_spline_parameterization",
265  "Initial acceleration %f out of bounds\n", t2[j].accelerations_[0]);
266  return false;
267  }
268  else if (t2[j].accelerations_[num_points - 1] > t2[j].max_acceleration_ ||
269  t2[j].accelerations_[num_points - 1] < t2[j].min_acceleration_)
270  {
271  ROS_ERROR_NAMED("trajectory_processing.iterative_spline_parameterization",
272  "Final acceleration %f out of bounds\n", t2[j].accelerations_[num_points - 1]);
273  return false;
274  }
275  }
276 
277  // Initialize times
278  // start with valid velocities, then expand intervals
279  // epsilon to prevent divide-by-zero
280  std::vector<double> time_diff(trajectory.getWayPointCount() - 1, std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon());
281  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < num_joints; j++)
282  init_times(num_points, &time_diff[0], &t2[j].positions_[0], t2[j].max_velocity_, t2[j].min_velocity_);
283 
284  // Stretch intervals until close to the bounds
285  while (1)
286  {
287  int loop = 0;
288 
289  // Calculate the interval stretches due to acceleration
290  std::vector<double> time_factor(num_points - 1, 1.00);
291  for (unsigned j = 0; j < num_joints; j++)
292  {
293  // Move points to satisfy initial/final acceleration
294  if (add_points_)
295  {
296  adjust_two_positions(num_points, &time_diff[0], &t2[j].positions_[0], &t2[j].velocities_[0],
297  &t2[j].accelerations_[0], t2[j].initial_acceleration_, t2[j].final_acceleration_);
298  }
299 
300  fit_cubic_spline(num_points, &time_diff[0], &t2[j].positions_[0], &t2[j].velocities_[0], &t2[j].accelerations_[0]);
301  for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_points; i++)
302  {
303  const double acc = t2[j].accelerations_[i];
304  double atfactor = 1.0;
305  if (acc > t2[j].max_acceleration_)
306  atfactor = sqrt(acc / t2[j].max_acceleration_);
307  if (acc < t2[j].min_acceleration_)
308  atfactor = sqrt(acc / t2[j].min_acceleration_);
309  if (atfactor > 1.01) // within 1%
310  loop = 1;
311  atfactor = (atfactor - 1.0) / 16.0 + 1.0; // 1/16th
312  if (i > 0)
313  time_factor[i - 1] = std::max(time_factor[i - 1], atfactor);
314  if (i < num_points - 1)
315  time_factor[i] = std::max(time_factor[i], atfactor);
316  }
317  }
318 
319  if (loop == 0)
320  break; // finished
321 
322  // Stretch
323  for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_points - 1; i++)
324  time_diff[i] *= time_factor[i];
325  }
326 
327  // Final adjustment forces the trajectory within bounds
328  globalAdjustment(t2, num_joints, num_points, time_diff);
329 
330  // Convert back to JointTrajectory form
331  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < num_points; i++)
332  trajectory.setWayPointDurationFromPrevious(i, time_diff[i - 1]);
333  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < num_points; i++)
334  {
335  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < num_joints; j++)
336  {
337  trajectory.getWayPointPtr(i)->setVariableVelocity(idx[j], t2[j].velocities_[i]);
338  trajectory.getWayPointPtr(i)->setVariableAcceleration(idx[j], t2[j].accelerations_[i]);
339  }
340 
341  // Only update position of additionally inserted points (at second and next-to-last position)
342  if (add_points_ && (i == 1 || i == num_points - 2))
343  {
344  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < num_joints; j++)
345  trajectory.getWayPointPtr(i)->setVariablePosition(idx[j], t2[j].positions_[i]);
346  trajectory.getWayPointPtr(i)->update();
347  }
348  }
349 
350  return true;
351 }
352 
354 
355 /*
356  Fit a 'clamped' cubic spline over a series of points.
357  A cubic spline ensures continuous function across positions,
358  1st derivative (velocities), and 2nd derivative (accelerations).
359  'Clamped' means the first derivative at the endpoints is specified.
360 
361  Fitting a cubic spline involves solving a series of linear equations.
362  The general form for each segment is:
363  (tj-t_(j-1))*x"_(j-1) + 2*(t_(j+1)-t_(j-1))*x"j + (t_(j+1)-tj)*x"_j+1) =
364  (x_(j+1)-xj)/(t_(j+1)-tj) - (xj-x_(j-1))/(tj-t_(j-1))
365  And the first and last segment equations are clamped to specified values: x1_i and x1_f.
366 
367  Represented in matrix form:
368  [ 2*(t1-t0) (t1-t0) 0 ][x0"] [(x1-x0)/(t1-t0) - t1_i ]
369  [ t1-t0 2*(t2-t0) t2-t1 ][x1"] [(x2-x1)/(t2-t1) - (x1-x0)/(t1-t0)]
370  [ t2-t1 2*(t3-t1) t3-t2 ][x2"] = 6 * [(x3-x2)/(t3/t2) - (x2-x1)/(t2-t1)]
371  [ ... ... ... ][...] [... ]
372  [ 0 tN-t_(N-1) 2*(tN-t_(N-1)) ][xN"] [t1_f - (xN-x_(N-1))/(tN-t_(N-1)) ]
373 
374  This matrix is tridiagonal, which can be solved solved in O(N) time
375  using the tridiagonal algorithm.
376  There is a forward propogation pass followed by a backsubstitution pass.
377 
378  n is the number of points
379  dt contains the time difference between each point (size=n-1)
380  x contains the positions (size=n)
381  x1 contains the 1st derivative (velocities) (size=n)
382  x1[0] and x1[n-1] MUST be specified.
383  x2 contains the 2nd derivative (accelerations) (size=n)
384  x1 and x2 are filled in by the algorithm.
385 */
386 
387 static void fit_cubic_spline(const int n, const double dt[], const double x[], double x1[], double x2[])
388 {
389  int i;
390  const double x1_i = x1[0], x1_f = x1[n - 1];
391 
392  // Tridiagonal alg - forward sweep
393  // x1 and x2 used to store the temporary coefficients c and d
394  // (will get overwritten during backsubstitution)
395  double *c = x1, *d = x2;
396  c[0] = 0.5;
397  d[0] = 3.0 * ((x[1] - x[0]) / dt[0] - x1_i) / dt[0];
398  for (i = 1; i <= n - 2; i++)
399  {
400  const double dt2 = dt[i - 1] + dt[i];
401  const double a = dt[i - 1] / dt2;
402  const double denom = 2.0 - a * c[i - 1];
403  c[i] = (1.0 - a) / denom;
404  d[i] = 6.0 * ((x[i + 1] - x[i]) / dt[i] - (x[i] - x[i - 1]) / dt[i - 1]) / dt2;
405  d[i] = (d[i] - a * d[i - 1]) / denom;
406  }
407  const double denom = dt[n - 2] * (2.0 - c[n - 2]);
408  d[n - 1] = 6.0 * (x1_f - (x[n - 1] - x[n - 2]) / dt[n - 2]);
409  d[n - 1] = (d[n - 1] - dt[n - 2] * d[n - 2]) / denom;
410 
411  // Tridiagonal alg - backsubstitution sweep
412  // 2nd derivative
413  x2[n - 1] = d[n - 1];
414  for (i = n - 2; i >= 0; i--)
415  x2[i] = d[i] - c[i] * x2[i + 1];
416 
417  // 1st derivative
418  x1[0] = x1_i;
419  for (i = 1; i < n - 1; i++)
420  x1[i] = (x[i + 1] - x[i]) / dt[i] - (2 * x2[i] + x2[i + 1]) * dt[i] / 6.0;
421  x1[n - 1] = x1_f;
422 }
423 
424 /*
425  Modify the value of x[1] and x[N-2]
426  so that 2nd derivative starts and ends at specified value.
427  This involves fitting the spline twice,
428  then solving for the specified value.
429 
430  x2_i and x2_f are the (initial and final) 2nd derivative at 0 and N-1
431 */
432 
433 static void adjust_two_positions(const int n, const double dt[], double x[], double x1[], double x2[],
434  const double x2_i, const double x2_f)
435 {
436  x[1] = x[0];
437  x[n - 2] = x[n - 3];
438  fit_cubic_spline(n, dt, x, x1, x2);
439  double a0 = x2[0];
440  double b0 = x2[n - 1];
441 
442  x[1] = x[2];
443  x[n - 2] = x[n - 1];
444  fit_cubic_spline(n, dt, x, x1, x2);
445  double a2 = x2[0];
446  double b2 = x2[n - 1];
447 
448  // we can solve this with linear equation (use two-point form)
449  if (a2 != a0)
450  x[1] = x[0] + ((x[2] - x[0]) / (a2 - a0)) * (x2_i - a0);
451  if (b2 != b0)
452  x[n - 2] = x[n - 3] + ((x[n - 1] - x[n - 3]) / (b2 - b0)) * (x2_f - b0);
453 }
454 
455 /*
456  Find time required to go max velocity on each segment.
457  Increase a segment's time interval if the current time isn't long enough.
458 */
459 
460 static void init_times(const int n, double dt[], const double x[], const double max_velocity, const double min_velocity)
461 {
462  int i;
463  for (i = 0; i < n - 1; i++)
464  {
465  double time;
466  double dx = x[i + 1] - x[i];
467  if (dx >= 0.0)
468  time = (dx / max_velocity);
469  else
470  time = (dx / min_velocity);
471  time += std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon(); // prevent divide-by-zero
472 
473  if (dt[i] < time)
474  dt[i] = time;
475  }
476 }
477 
478 /*
479  Fit a spline, then check each interval to see if bounds are met.
480  If all bounds met (no time adjustments made), return 0.
481  If bounds not met (time adjustments made), slightly increase the
482  surrounding time intervals and return 1.
483 
484  n is the number of points
485  dt contains the time difference between each point (size=n-1)
486  x contains the positions (size=n)
487  x1 contains the 1st derivative (velocities) (size=n)
488  x1[0] and x1[n-1] MUST be specified.
489  x2 contains the 2nd derivative (accelerations) (size=n)
490  max_velocity is the max velocity for this joint.
491  min_velocity is the min velocity for this joint.
492  max_acceleration is the max acceleration for this joint.
493  min_acceleration is the min acceleration for this joint.
494  tfactor is the time adjustment (multiplication) factor.
495  x1 and x2 are filled in by the algorithm.
496 */
497 
498 static int fit_spline_and_adjust_times(const int n, double dt[], const double x[], double x1[], double x2[],
499  const double max_velocity, const double min_velocity,
500  const double max_acceleration, const double min_acceleration,
501  const double tfactor)
502 {
503  int i, ret = 0;
504 
505  fit_cubic_spline(n, dt, x, x1, x2);
506 
507  // Instantaneous velocity is calculated at each point
508  for (i = 0; i < n - 1; i++)
509  {
510  const double vel = x1[i];
511  const double vel2 = x1[i + 1];
512  if (vel > max_velocity || vel < min_velocity || vel2 > max_velocity || vel2 < min_velocity)
513  {
514  dt[i] *= tfactor;
515  ret = 1;
516  }
517  }
518  // Instantaneous acceleration is calculated at each point
519  if (ret == 0)
520  {
521  for (i = 0; i < n - 1; i++)
522  {
523  const double acc = x2[i];
524  const double acc2 = x2[i + 1];
525  if (acc > max_acceleration || acc < min_acceleration || acc2 > max_acceleration || acc2 < min_acceleration)
526  {
527  dt[i] *= tfactor;
528  ret = 1;
529  }
530  }
531  }
532 
533  return ret;
534 }
535 
536 // return global expansion multiplicative factor required
537 // to force within bounds.
538 // Assumes that the spline is already fit
539 // (fit_cubic_spline must have been called before this).
540 static double global_adjustment_factor(const int n, double dt[], const double x[], double x1[], double x2[],
541  const double max_velocity, const double min_velocity,
542  const double max_acceleration, const double min_acceleration)
543 {
544  int i;
545  double tfactor2 = 1.00;
546 
547  // fit_cubic_spline(n, dt, x, x1, x2);
548 
549  for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
550  {
551  double tfactor;
552  tfactor = x1[i] / max_velocity;
553  if (tfactor2 < tfactor)
554  tfactor2 = tfactor;
555  tfactor = x1[i] / min_velocity;
556  if (tfactor2 < tfactor)
557  tfactor2 = tfactor;
558 
559  if (x2[i] >= 0)
560  {
561  tfactor = sqrt(fabs(x2[i] / max_acceleration));
562  if (tfactor2 < tfactor)
563  tfactor2 = tfactor;
564  }
565  else
566  {
567  tfactor = sqrt(fabs(x2[i] / min_acceleration));
568  if (tfactor2 < tfactor)
569  tfactor2 = tfactor;
570  }
571  }
572 
573  return tfactor2;
574 }
575 
576 // Expands the entire trajectory to fit exactly within bounds
577 void globalAdjustment(std::vector<SingleJointTrajectory>& t2, int num_joints, const int num_points,
578  std::vector<double>& time_diff)
579 {
580  double gtfactor = 1.0;
581  for (int j = 0; j < num_joints; j++)
582  {
583  double tfactor;
584  tfactor = global_adjustment_factor(num_points, &time_diff[0], &t2[j].positions_[0], &t2[j].velocities_[0],
585  &t2[j].accelerations_[0], t2[j].max_velocity_, t2[j].min_velocity_,
586  t2[j].max_acceleration_, t2[j].min_acceleration_);
587  if (tfactor > gtfactor)
588  gtfactor = tfactor;
589  }
590 
591  // printf("# Global adjustment: %0.4f%%\n", 100.0 * (gtfactor - 1.0));
592  for (int i = 0; i < num_points - 1; i++)
593  time_diff[i] *= gtfactor;
594 
595  for (int j = 0; j < num_joints; j++)
596  {
597  fit_cubic_spline(num_points, &time_diff[0], &t2[j].positions_[0], &t2[j].velocities_[0], &t2[j].accelerations_[0]);
598  }
599 }
600 } // namespace trajectory_processing
